title: godoc for /pkg/foo/ could have links to child packages
body:
It'd be nice if e.g.

http://golang.org/pkg/image/
http://golang.org/pkg/hash/
http://golang.org/pkg/crypto/openpgp/

... had links in godoc to their "child" packages.

Not sure if this is a gri or adg thing.  I've never looked at the godoc code but would
do it if neither of you want to or have time.
